lefi.exts.commands.core.command module

class Command(name: str, callback: Callable[[...], Coroutine])

Bases: object

A class representing a Command.

Attributes:

checks (List[Callable[…, bool]]): A list of checks to be run before the command is executed. parent (Optional[Plugin]): The parent plugin of the command. cooldown (Cooldown): The cooldown of the command. callback (Callable[…, Coroutine]): The callback of the command. name (str): The name of the command.

check(check: Callable[[...], bool]) → Callable[[...], Union[lefi.exts.commands.core.command.Command, Coroutine]]

A decorator to add a check to a command.

Parameters:

check (Callable[…, bool]): The check to be added.

Returns:

The command with the check added.

command(name: Optional[str] = None) → Callable[[...], lefi.exts.commands.core.command.Command]

A decorator to add a command to a plugin.

Parameters:

name (Optional[str]): The name of the command.

Returns:

The command with the plugin added.

cooldown(uses: int, time: float, type: lefi.exts.commands.core.cooldowns.CooldownType) → Callable[[...], Union[lefi.exts.commands.core.command.Command, Coroutine]]

A decorator to add a cooldown to a command.

Parameters:

uses (int): The amount of uses the cooldown has. time (float): The time the cooldown lasts. type (CooldownType): The type of the cooldown.

Returns:

The command with the cooldown added.

lefi.exts.commands.core.context module

class Context(message: Message, parser: StringParser, bot: Bot)

Bases: object

The Context of a command.

Attributes:

command (Command): The [Command](./command.md) that was called. parser (StringParser): The [Parser](./parser.md) that was used to parse the command. bot (Bot): The [Bot](../bot.md) that is running the command.

property author: Union[User, Member]

The author of the message.

property channel: Union[Channel, DMChannel]

The [Channel](../../channel.md) that the message was sent in.

property guild: Optional[Guild]

The [Guild](../../guild.md) that the message was sent in.

property message: Message

The [Message](../../message.md) that was sent.

async send(*args, **kwargs) → Message

Send a message to the channel.

Parameters:

args: The arguments to pass when sending the message kwargs: The keyword arguments to pass to the message.

Returns:

Message: The [Message](../../message.md) that was sent.

property valid: bool

Whether or not the context is valid.

lefi.exts.commands.core.cooldowns module

class Cooldown(amount: int, time: float, type: lefi.exts.commands.core.cooldowns.CooldownType)

Bases: object

A class that represents a Cooldown.

Attributes:

amount (int): The amount of uses. time (float): The amount of time until the cooldown resets. type (CooldownType): The type of cooldown. members_cooldowns_cache (Cache[Dict[int, CooldownData]]): The cache for member cooldowns. cooldowns_cache (Cache[CooldownData]): The cache for cooldowns.

delete_cooldown(message) → None

Deletes the cooldown for the command.

Parameters:

message (Message): The [Message](../../message.md) that triggered the command.
